name: Valpak Limited
membership: Packaging Federation, British Retail Consortium, INCPEN, Recoup, CBI, IoD, ICER, Metal Matters, Pro Europe and WEEE Scheme Forum
memberOrga: We do not have members in the way that a Trade Association would have members, but our compliance scheme customers are referred to as members of the schemes, but we are not a membership organisation.
goal: UK Producer Compliance scheme for Packaging, WEEE and Batteries Regulations
euInitiatives: Packaging Directive, WEEE Directive, Batteries Directives, Waste Framework Directive, Circular Economy Package, Regulation on Shipments of Waste
